solution_line_template: In the first round, Richard knocked down {patrick_first} + {richard_first_more} = <<{patrick_first}+{richard_first_more}={richard_first}>>{richard_first} pins.
In the second round, Patrick knocked down {richard_first} x {patrick_second_multiplier} = <<{richard_first}*{patrick_second_multiplier}={patrick_second}>>{patrick_second} pins.
In the second round, Richard knocked down {patrick_second} - {richard_second_less} = <<{patrick_second}-{richard_second_less}={richard_second}>>{richard_second} pins.
In total, Patrick knocked down {patrick_first} + {patrick_second} = <<{patrick_first}+{patrick_second}={patrick_total}>>{patrick_total} pins
In total, Richard knocked down {richard_first} + {richard_second} = <<{richard_first}+{richard_second}={richard_total}>>{richard_total} pins
Richard knocked down {richard_total} - {patrick_total} = <<{richard_total}-{patrick_total}={difference}>>{difference} pins more than Patrick.
